Place Where I Don't Exist

20 February 2023


Is it warmer in the place where I don’t exist?
Does the sun shine brighter there?
If it is, then what makes it so?

Why do you look in the mirror?
What are you hoping to see?
Who’s that stranger staring back?
What if you switched places with them?

Is your reality a distorted reflection
Of something that’s meant to be?
Or is it as real as the text on the screen
That was typed for amusement only?
